contents: @Zxcbnmvvv: Fukushima melted fuel removal begins 2021, end state unknown (https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/fukushima-melted-fuel-removal-begins-2021-end-state-67426592) (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fukushima_Daiichi_nuclear_disaster_(Unit_2_Reactor)#Meltdown) (https://english.kyodonews.net/news/2019/12/957487f7b687-fukushima-nuclear-debris-removal-to-begin-in-2021.html) 你从哪看出解决了融化堆芯进入地下水了?
